entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
